SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.queue

Class InMemoryQueueDatabase<T extends Serializable>

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.queue.InMemoryQueueDatabase<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of items stored in the queue, must be Serializable
All Implemented Interfaces:
QueueDatabase<T>, Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class InMemoryQueueDatabase<T extends Serializable> extends Object implements QueueDatabase<T>
In-memory implementation of QueueDatabase for testing or temporary queues.

This implementation does not persist data to disk and is lost on application restart.

Uses CopyOnWriteArrayList for thread-safe FIFO operations with indexed access support.

    • removeByIndices

      public int removeByIndices(List<Integer> indices)
      Remove items from the queue by indices (0-based).

      Indices are processed in descending order to avoid index shifting issues.

      Specified by:
      removeByIndices in interface QueueDatabase<T extends Serializable>
      Parameters:
      indices - The indices of items to remove
      Returns:
      Number of items successfully removed
